snippet: The beleaguered mayor, Tony Mack, said after the raid that he had not violated the public trust.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation agents search the home of Trenton, NJ, Mayor Tony Mack in a predawn raid; Mack's administration has been plagued by accusations of cronyism and reckless spending, but the mayor says that he has not violated the public trust.
lead_paragraph: The beleaguered mayor, Tony Mack, said after the raid that he had not violated the public trust.

headline.seo: F.B.I. Raids Home of Trenton Mayor Tony Mack
headline.main: F.B.I. Raids the Home of the Mayor of Trenton
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Raids The Home Of the Mayor Of Trenton
